Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -4 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Diehard: Remains conscious, stable, and able to act with negative HP
Final Revelation (Battle Mystery): May take a full-attack action and move 20' as a full-round action/Crit ignores DR/+4 AC vs. crit/Does not die until -33 HP
Greater Disarm: +2 disarm checks, disarmed weapons land 15' away
Improved Disarm: Disarm provokes no AOO, gains +2 Disarm check and CMD
Maneuver Mastery: +5 CMB on chosen combat maneuver
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Resiliency (Oracle): Not disabled or staggered at 0 HP/No HP loss from taking action while disabled
Step Up: May match foe 5' step
Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range
Surprising Charge: May move as an immediate action 3/dy
War Sight: May take choice of 3 Initiative rolls/May always act in surprise round

Spells:
Control Weather (O7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Earthquake (O8 Evoc): R1200' Intense tremor shakes 80' radius for 1 rd
Enlarge Person (O1 Tran): R75' Target humanoid dbl size (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity, -1 attack, -1 AC) (DC 14 Fort neg) for 20 min
Fog Cloud (O2 Conj): R300' Fog in 20' radius obscures vision for 200 min
Magic Vestment (O3 Tran): Touched armor, shield, or clothing gives +5 AC for 20 hr
Mass Bull's Strength (O6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Strength for 20 min
Righteous Might (O5 Tran): Self dbl size (+4 Str, +2 Con, -2 Dex, +2 AC) and gains DR 10/evil or DR 10/good for 20 rd
Stoneskin (Iron Skin4 Abju): Touched gains DR 10/adamantine for 150 HP or 200 min
Storm Of Vengeance (O9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 22 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 22 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Wall Of Fire (O4 Evoc): R300' 400' wall inflicts 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', 1d4 HP to creatures w/in 20', 2d6+20 HP when passing through (undead dbl) for conc + 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Combat Healer: May use two spell slots to cast Cure spell as a swift action 4/dy
Elemental Spell (Cold): May use +1 spell slot to convert half or all spell damage to cold damage
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Iron Skin: May use self Stoneskin effects 2/dy
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May spend +2 spell slot to force target to take worse of 2 saving throws
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
